steps.description: 1. Fill the empty 2×2 hole inside the hollow square ring in the upper-left with color 4 (yellow) — i.e., paint the 4 cells inside that 4×4 green outline.

2. Locate the left small L‑shaped foot (the 3‑cell green cluster below/left of the main body) and paint the single cell of that cluster that is closest to the body (the inner corner of the L) with color 4 (yellow).

3. Locate the right small L‑shaped foot (the 3‑cell green cluster at the lower-right) and paint the single cell of that cluster that is closest to the body (the inner corner of that L) with color 4 (yellow).
